abstract: Neither ace was dominant, but the Tigers’ Justin Verlander was better than C.C. Sabathia, and the Tigers put the Yankees on the brink of elimination with a 5-4 win on Monday.
snippet: Neither ace was dominant, but the Tigers’ Justin Verlander was better than C.C. Sabathia, and the Tigers put the Yankees on the brink of elimination with a 5-4 win on Monday.
